channel.title: ~~~Color Change After Input?~~~
channel.description:
Where like, on my client... would i change the color of what you typed it would turn out to be?? --if that makes since??
**like if i type HI, on my client.. how do i make it be -white- EVERY time.. so if i say "HI" exactly, when i hit 'Enter' itll show up on server as "White: HI/@Whi@ Hi"
